column3: Cabinet, 5A40 Head, complete, covering per customer spec.
5A40 Chassis kit. Chassis, brass plate, fiber boards
Footswitch,  2 button w/phone plug. Tip is Reverb, Ring is Vibrato
Cable, reverb, 1', straight plug on both ends
Knob, black, chicken head, flat top
Bolt, machine, #4-40x5/16, with nut and star washer
Bolt, chassis, tweed style, chrome, with nut
Chassis mount phone jack, non shorting
Switch, toggle, panel mount, DPDT, center off
Nut, #8-32 with integral washer (for mounting reverb pan)
2" black drywall screw for mounting reverb pan
